minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Let's discuss the ai insurance poc development and where we stand.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your API integration is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The runway extension timeline is tight, but we're confident about POC.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Investor rejections are normal. Focus on improving your LTV metrics.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: We're addressing the model drift issues and expect CAC to improve next quarter.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your API integration is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The due diligence timeline is tight, but we're confident about product-market fit.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Focus on MVP first. I made similar mistakes in my early days.
